Questo gioco è da provare assolutamente. Il gameplay, la cura ai dettagli che ti fa dimenticare che è del 98' e la storia rendono il tutto un'esperienza unica. Il gioco non è solo uno sparatutto, bisogna usare tutte le proprie risorse per non morire e usare non solo fucili e pistole ma anche granate, bombe con sensori e altro per non esaurire le munizioni principali o per uccidere gruppi di nemici / distruggere passaggi bloccati. Da provare di sicuro.

After beating the game, I now understand why the Half-Life franchise is so popular. Given the era that this game was released in, I can't believe it still holds up so well. Back then, it must have been groundbreaking. The atmosphere was immersive and Gordon Freeman is a badass.

Each level is pretty well made and it doesn't get boring with different mechanics thrown into the mix often (Like platforming).

Well worth the pick up.
it be good

The game has a old school charm with a large dedicated following.  You may either love it or not.  Graphics are not high tech but comfortable.  The game speed is adequate for average players who do not wish to lose their focus on the fun.  I have been playing this game since around 1999.
Un clásico entre clásicos. juego totalmente recomendado para gozar lo que eran las historias de antaño sin necesidad de tener charlas largas ni cinemáticas extensas. En resumen un JUE-GA-ZO

Half Life is a amazing game, played my first playthrough this week and loved it, Zen was not as fun as Black Mesa itself, but however i would recommend playing through it atleast once, i'd say play this first before Black Mesa, AND DON'T PLAY SOURCE. Overall it's easy to see how this game was so innovative and amazing for its time, a enjoyable experience overall.

A lot of old classics fail to stand the test of time. They are clunky, boring, uninteresting, and look like crap. Half Life is not one of those games. The visual style is great for what it is, the gameplay is fun and complex, and it has a very lengthy story. If you have the worst of the worst pc specs and can't even run potato games, I would absolutely recommend this at full price. Otherwise, on sale it is a must buy for the price.

Play it and play it right, this isn't your regular FPS. Play it slow, listen for your enemy, use all the tools in your arsenal. DON'T RUN AND GUN. Take it slow and not only you will enjoy the game, but you won't have to play it on ten health! Brilliant game, still play it a lot even now!

FPS oyun tarihine çağ atlatan bir oyun. Harika aksiyonu ve bulmacavari ilerleyişi ile sizi oradan oraya sürüklüyor. Ana karakterimiz Freeman tek kelime bile etmemesine rağmen oyuncuyla bütünleşebiliyor. Çıktığı günden bu yana çoğu oyun için bir mihenk taşı ve yol gösterici oldu. Oyun dünyasının klasiklerinden biri.

Mds do Ceu, assim deveria ser crime comercializar uma droga tao boa e viciante, acho que vou pro NA, HL ta sendo muito bom, os graficos são realmente de 95, mas com a possibiliadade de colocar em full hd e os graficos no maximo, fica muito gostoso de jogar... Ah! E a historia, meu querido a historia... acho que vale muito a pena compra toda essa trilogia e os dois jogos de portal, pois ha uma ligação entre as historias. Comprei ele junto com sua continuação na Summer Sale, economizei bastante dinheiro, mas se soubesse que o jogo era tão bom teria comprado quando pudesse.
